item.title: Rectangle Area 2
item.description: Question We are given a list of (axis-aligned) rectangles. Each rectangle[i] = [xi1, yi1, xi2, yi2] , where (xi1, yi1) are the coordinates of the bottom-left corner, and (xi2, yi2) are the coordinates of the top-right corner of the ith rectangle. Find the total area covered by all rectangles in the plane. Since the answer may be too large, return it modulo 10^9 + 7. Examples Input: rectangles = [[0,0,2,2],[1,0,2,3],[1,0,3,1]] Output: 6 Explanation: As illustrated in the picture.
